### Combine Three DF

```{r}
colnames(df) <- c("Date","Open","High","Low", "Close", "Adj.Close","Volume")
colnames(df_1) <- c("Date","Open","High","Low", "Close", "Adj.Close","Volume")
colnames(df_2) <- c("Date","Open","High","Low", "Close", "Adj.Close","Volume")

stock <- rbind(df,df_1,df_2)
stock$Date <- lubridate::mdy(stock$Date)
stock$Volume <- as.numeric(stock$Volume)
```

### Plot Daily Volume

```{r}
ggplot(stock) + geom_line(aes(x=Date,y=Volume)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) + ylim(0, 150000)  
```

### Plot Open, High and Close

```{r}
ggplot(stock) + geom_line(aes(x=Date,y=Close)) +
  geom_errorbar(data =stock,aes(ymin=Low,ymax=High))
```
